articles.title: Outrage, anger and astonishment: How families of victims and law enforcement experts reacted to the leaked Uvalde video
articles.description: The response from the families of the Uvalde massacre victims was of anger and outrage, the reaction from law enforcement experts was that of astonishment and dismay.
articles.content:

articles.title: Watch: Tapper and Bolton debate Trump's ability to plan a coup - CNN Video
articles.description: CNN's Jake Tapper and former National Security Adviser to Trump, John Bolton, disagree on the idea that the former president was capable of planning a coup on January 6th.

articles.title: 'Terrible idea': Pat Cipollone denounces Sidney Powell's 2020 election voting machine plan - CNN Video
articles.description: In an interview with the House Select Committee investigating January 6, former Trump White House Counsel Pat Cipollone told members he thought lawyer Sidney Powell's idea of having the federal government seize state voting machines was "a terrible idea."
